title: Abrasive and additive interactions in high selectivity STI CMP slurries

samples.experiment_context: Lab-synthesized ceria (ceria-CM) from Cerium Carbonate precursor, calcined at 300°C for 3h, milled. Used in CMP slurry without additives at pH 7.

cmp_performance.pad_conditioning: ex-situ using silicon carbide grit paper
